name: Employee Work From Homes
report_script:
if from_date and to_date:
    result = frappe.db.sql("""
        SELECT employee, employee_name, from_date, to_date,
            SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(to_date, from_date) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE DATEDIFF(to_date, from_date) END) AS total_days
        FROM `tabWork From Home`
        WHERE from_date >= %s AND to_date <= %s GROUP BY employee, employee_name, from_date, to_date
    """, (from_date, to_date))
else:
    result = frappe.db.sql("SELECT employee, employee_name, from_date, to_date, SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(to_date, from_date) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE DATEDIFF(to_date, from_date) END) AS total_days from `tabWork From Home` GROUP BY employee, employee_name, from_date, to_date")
